tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (VP (VB Follow) (NP (PRP me)) (PP (IN on) (NP (NP (NNP Twitter)) (PP (IN for) (NP (NP (JJ official) (NN @OfficialPWG) (NNS results)) (CC and) (NP (NN coverage)))))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Follow/VB dobj>me/PRP nmod:on>[Twitter/NNP case>on/IN nmod:for>[results/NNS case>for/IN amod>official/JJ compound>@OfficialPWG/NN cc>and/CC conj:and>coverage/NN] nmod:for>coverage/NN]]
